I love this keyboard. It never drops the Bluetooth connection and typing on it is awesome. I‚Äôve achieved higher speeds than my normal average. The key layout is the best in the business. Just buy it. You won‚Äôt regret it!

Worked for one week and then randomly disconnected from my bluetooth and is no longer discoverable no matter what I do. Very sad considering the price tag. I got rid of the original packaging so not sure what to do now.
Works well Bluetooth only.Only complaint no rear height adjustment option. Will get over it.
Too small and not sure if an actual genuine Microsoft product
Really nice entry level Bluetooth keyboard. No adjustable height but long battery life and solid bluetooth connection.
This is an excellent keyboard. Working from home because of covid-19 I got this and when I go back to work I might bring it with me. Much better than the one I have from my employer!
Another solid product by Microsoft. Small light easy connections and quiet typing make this a great keyboard to have
Great keyboard. The key presses feel very good. I just wish the keys were backlit.
Microsoft quality. Well built.  Works well
Plug and play...c'est tout ce que je demande pour un clavier de bureau.
I collect synthesizers and they like to go MIDI through usb so i have no extra space to plug in a keyboard or mousethis is THE solution
Nice comfortable design for work and love that its Bluetooth so can be used easily with other devices
No caps lock light.  Constant disconnections.  Stay away.
Basic keyboard works well.
Decent if you do not want wires hanging around.Good for on and off web browing. Not ergonomic at all but it was expected anyway.
Great Product comfortable on the hands. Not super loud keys
doesn't connect very well
Everything as described.
Easy to connect- works great

No real complaints about this keyboard. It does what it needs to do and it‚Äôs pretty comfortable to use. I would say the only disappointment for me is that it does not have an indication light to let you know if the CAPS lock is on.  Everything else seems standard. Works great with MS 365.
It works fine at first but in less than a month the Bluetooth connection is not working? Who should I contact?
Very good product. Good quality and useful.
This item was easy to set up with my smart TV

Love it. Bluetooth helps to cut down on all the cords at my desk. Quiet buttons for typing. Easy to set up. Has good finger distance and has zero discomfort for typing. My ONLY issue is there are no raisers to tilt at an angle. Very flat typing so wrists are a little extended beyond comfort. It‚Äôs easy for travel but I‚Äôve started to keep it at my office at work. It‚Äôs perfect for small spaces.

Le clavier est ergonomique et vraiment agr√©able √† utiliser. 2 b√©mols : la touche cadenas qui lock l'ordinateur est trop proche des autres touches et malencontreusement on peut le locker en √©crivant un courriel. Paid half price because the box was damaged the form that came with it also mentioned ‚Äúminor cosmetic damage‚Äù but I can‚Äôt notice any! Very happy with my purchase! Very easy to connect to my Microsoft surface tablet I love having the full size keyboard as opposed to the keyboard that attaches to my surface.
But fir the price this is a great keyboard ... Bluetooth is the way to go if you want wireless ... doest use up USB slots

If you work a lot with Windows and O365 this one is a great addition.The keys are optimized for the most used functions they are silent and feel like quality.It is not particularly ergonomic but would work well with additional wrist support.

Exactly what I was looking for at the price point.  Needed blue-tooth connectivity without the need for a dongle.

Blue tooth was very difficult to connect. It took too much time to connect and a lot of patience.Important functions such as CAPS does not have an indicator light so we don‚Äôt know if it‚Äôs off or on.No PRINT SCREEN button. It would be nice to have integrated legs to allow the keyboard to be tilted.

Very slim and compact.  I find comfortable enough no hand wrist fatigue.  purchased to WFH then bought one for my office.  connects seamlessly.  quiet keys but you know when you have hit them.i miss the backlit keys on my laptop though.

I only gave it 4 stars instead of 5 as it does not have any feet on the back to tilt it slightly. That means it sits flat which takes some getting used to when you type.  Regardless. I recommend this and if Microsoft realizes their error I will purchase an update that puts legs on it

There is a lock button right above the backspace button and I'm frequently accidentally pressing this and locking my machine when trying to backspace. Placement of this button could be better. Not that the button is even needed.

It feels okay but there are no print screen key. Also if you do not type on it for a bit there is a delay before the keyboard responds when you type again is extremely annoying. I went through all the settings on the computer and turned off bluetooth power saving etc but there is still always that delay.

Bought this for when I work on the kitchen table as my laptop is on a stand and can't use it's keyboard. It pairs without any issue the layout is fine and it's very lightweight. The only issue I have with it is that there's no way to turn it off. If I forget the keyboard somewhere anyone -- including the cats -- can press keys while you're using the laptop. The first time it happened I thought I got hacked. :)
Fine but too expensive you could buy other cheaper from lesser brands and the build quality would be the same.

After a few months keyboard randomly disconnects every 30 mins then doesn't work for 30-40 seconds and then starts working again. This is super annoying especially when typing up documents or working with video or playing games useless keyboard a 5$ wired keyboard is better than this.
